snippet: Workers at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in Ukraine have begun dismantling a ventilation stack that has filtered radioactive gases from the reactor that was destroyed in an accident in 1986.
abstract: Workers at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in Ukraine have begun dismantling a ventilation stack that has filtered radioactive gases from the reactor that was destroyed in an accident in 1986; work is expected to take about five weeks.
lead_paragraph: Workers at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in Ukraine have begun dismantling a ventilation stack that has filtered radioactive gases from the reactor that was destroyed in an accident in 1986.

headline.main: Ukraine: Workers Removing Parts of Chernobyl Plant
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Workers Removing Parts of Chernobyl Plant
